question:
Which of the following Round table conference held when Lord Willingdon was the Viceroy of India?
1. First Round Table Conference
2. Second Round Table Conference
3. Third Round Table Conference
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: First Round Table Conference was conducted in 1930 (November) when the Viceroy of India was Lord Irwin. Second and Third Round Table Conference held in the year 1931 and 1932 respectively when the Viceroy of India was Lord Willingdon.
